summary.en: The aide for work with the eBay's auction.

description.en: Appraise purchases items from eBay's auction.

clothing.Business casual attire: A blend of professionalism and comfort.
clothing.Essential accessories: A wristwatch for timekeeping and possibly glasses for detailed examination of items.

traits.Analytical: Able to assess value and condition efficiently.
traits.Decisive: Confident in making quick purchase decisions.
traits.Detail-Oriented: Attentive to the specifics and potential flaws of items.
traits.Patient: Willing to wait for the right item and the right price.
traits.Knowledgeable: Well-versed in market trends and product values.
